posts.post_title: F/s psa graded mathewson bender mcgraw
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards strictly for sale.

Scans will follow eventually, however if you need photos let me know.

I will let these run on here for a week and then move them to ebay next Sunday.

All prices are delivered via PP FF.


Chief Bender PORTRAIT (Sweet Caporal) PSA Authentic $70
Christy Mathewson WHITE CAP (Piedmont 150) PSA 1 $200 SOLD
John McGraw GLOVE AT HIP (Tolstoi) PSA 2 $175
